title: Chain
info: Chains are used both for climbing, and as components for various crafting recipes. They are used in crafting items such as the Grappling Hook, Sawmill, all types of Watches, and Chandeliers. Chains can be placed and used like Rope and offer the same ascent speed 41 mph, the descent speed 51 mph (1,760ft in 25 seconds), although they cannot be turned into coils like ropes can. Placed chains are background objects, and much like furniture, do not count as background walls in a house.
